title: Small Railway Engines
description: Introduction to the new Controller, called the small controller, a new branch line called the small railway and new engines Rex, Bert and Mike. Awdry himself makes a fictionalised appearance as the Thin Clergyman.BALLAST: Donald and Douglas report meeting "vera wee engines" and Duck goes to investigateTIT FOR TAT: The small engines the Thin and Fat clergymen, who promise to write about them in a book.MIKE'S WHISTLE: Mike loses his whistleUSEFUL RAILWAY: Rex is derailed by a bale of wool
author: W. Awdry
